data.text: @OHAOregon Yeah, we're done with covid and stew done with you. You're not need anymore. Go away @OHAOregon
@smbrander @OHAOregon …where there never should have been one in the first place because masks don’t prevent viral spread and are by definition unhealthy. Absurd to keep them on.
@DavidWallaceXYZ Happy to share my thoughts as long as they’re helpful to folks, will be very excited to turn this account off someday

@OHAinContext @OHAOregon Right?  I’m just worried everything’s being lifted just as we start to learn how bad covid—even mild cases—can be.  Thank you for the reply.  And all your hard work breaking down  data for us over the past two years. Greatly appreciated.

@DavidWallaceXYZ @OHAOregon Seems bad!

Seriously though I haven’t had a chance to read it, but coupled with all the other things like cardiac degradation and such, it seems we have severely mischaracterized how “mild” even “mild covid” is, and that’s a huge problem.
@OHAinContext @OHAOregon Thoughts on this?  Brain changes from even mild Covid cases.  https://t.co/9I0g3hw99v

@OHAOregon Here you are saying it's a "good idea" to wear masks indoors during THE EXACT SAME WEEK Y'ALL LIFTED OUR STATEWIDE MASK MANDATE.

So which is it, @OHAOregon? Are masks good for public health right now or not?

@OHAOregon OHA dudes are preparing groundwork to bring back masks within weeks of making masks optional this weekend.  They are just incompetent bunch of folks sitting in AC room with no idea on ground . Just following their political science masters (Read Gov B)
